moonTips.New Moon: Plan, set intentions, meditate. A time for inner stillness.
moonTips.Waxing Crescent: Set goals, visualize, take first steps. Energy is building.
moonTips.First Quarter: Act with courage, push through doubts. Time to break through.
moonTips.Waxing Gibbous: Refine your plans, gather strength. Almost at the peak.
moonTips.Full Moon: Release emotions, complete projects, celebrate. Energy at its fullest.
moonTips.Waning Gibbous: Reflect, share, give thanks. Time to harvest insights.
moonTips.Last Quarter: Let go, clear your space and mind. Release the unnecessary.
moonTips.Waning Crescent: Rest, restore, surrender. Prepare for the new cycle.

New Moon.name: Black Tourmaline
New Moon.description: Helps cleanse the past and set new intentions.
New Moon.howToUse: Hold it in your hands, focus on your monthly goal. Carry it with you or place it under your pillow.

Waxing Crescent.name: Labradorite
Waxing Crescent.description: Enhances intuition and supports the growth and manifestation of intentions.
Waxing Crescent.howToUse: Meditate with it while visualizing your desires beginning to sprout.

First Quarter.name: Carnelian
First Quarter.description: Gives motivation and energy for action, helps overcome doubts.
First Quarter.howToUse: Keep it close during active tasks, carry it in your pocket or wear it on your wrist.

Waxing Gibbous.name: Citrine
Waxing Gibbous.description: Boosts confidence, attracts success and clarity.
Waxing Gibbous.howToUse: Write down what you’ve achieved and express gratitude — the crystal will charge you for the final push.

Full Moon.name: Selenite
Full Moon.description: Helps to cleanse, let go of the unnecessary, and connect to your intuition.
Full Moon.howToUse: Do a cleansing meditation, keep it near you while sleeping or during a bath.

Waning Gibbous.name: Moonstone
Waning Gibbous.description: Deepens intuition, helps release the unnecessary and maintain inner balance.
Waning Gibbous.howToUse: Meditate with it in the evening, journal your gratitude, and slow down.

Last Quarter.name: Amethyst
Last Quarter.description: Helps to reflect on experiences, release mistakes, and wrap things up.
Last Quarter.howToUse: Keep a journal, place the crystal nearby and let your thoughts flow freely.

Waning Crescent.name: Lepidolite
Waning Crescent.description: Relieves anxiety and supports deep restoration.
Waning Crescent.howToUse: Rest, place the crystal under your pillow or use it during an evening meditation.
